00025 
00026 #ifndef ITEMMAP_H
00027 #define ITEMMAP_H
00028 
00029 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00030 #include "config.h"
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 #include <iostream>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 #include <string>
00036 #include <functional>
00037 
00038 #include "hash_map.hpp"
00039 
00040 #if !defined(_STLPORT_VERSION) && defined(_MSC_VER) && ((_MSC_VER >= 1300) || defined(__INTEL_COMPILER))
00041     // workaround for MSVC7's hash_map declaration
00042     template <typename T, typename HashFunc = hash_compare<T, _STD less<T> >, typename EqualKey = _STD allocator< _STD pair<const T, size_t> > >
00043 #else
00044     template <typename T, typename HashFunc = hash<T>, typename EqualKey = std::equal_to<T> >
00045 #endif
00046 class ItemMap {
00047     public:
00048         typedef T      item_type;
00049         typedef size_t id_type;
00050         typedef hash_map <T, id_type, HashFunc, EqualKey>         hash_map_type;
00051         // static const size_t null_id = ~(ItemMap::id_type)0;
00052         static const size_t null_id;
00053         typedef typename std::vector<T>::iterator       iterator;
00054         typedef typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00055 
00056         ItemMap(){}
00057 
00058         ~ItemMap();
00059 
00060         iterator begin() { return m_index.begin(); }
00061 
00062         iterator end() { return m_index.end(); }
00063 
00064         const_iterator begin() const { return m_index.begin(); }
00065 
00066         const_iterator end() const { return m_index.end(); }
00067 
00068         size_t size() const { return m_index.size(); }
00069 
00070         bool empty() const { return m_index.empty(); }
00071 
00072         void clear();
00073 
00078         id_type add(const T& f);
00079 
00084         id_type id(const T& f) const {
00085             typename hash_map_type::const_iterator it = m_hashdict.find(f);
00086             if (it == m_hashdict.end())
00087                 return null_id;
00088             return it->second;
00089             // return has_item(f) ? m_hashdict[f] : null_id;
00090         }
00091 
00092         bool has_item(const T& f) const {
00093             return m_hashdict.find(f) != m_hashdict.end();
00094         }
00095 
00096         const T& operator[](id_type id) const {
00097             return m_index[id];
00098         }
00099 
00100     private:
00101         mutable hash_map_type m_hashdict;
00102         std::vector<T>        m_index;
00103 };
00104 
00105 template <typename T, typename HashFunc, typename EqualKey >
00106 const size_t ItemMap<T, HashFunc, EqualKey>::null_id =
00107 ~(typename ItemMap<T, HashFunc, EqualKey>::id_type)(0); // -1 is null_id
00108 // (typename ItemMap<T, HashFunc, EqualKey>::id_type)(-1); // -1 is null_id
00109 #include "itemmap.tcc"
00110 #endif /* ifndef ITEMMAP_H */
